Entries.default: A soul shimmers before you, her faint glow unreflected by the trees. Flowing gossamer silks sheathe her form, and long, black tendrils of hair crown her head.
"Who are you?"

"My blade? It has found me once again."

An ephemeral hand reaches out to Marux Amanth, to grasp at the ancient dagger, but the soul stops short.
"A wound? What kind of wound?"
[Say nothing.]
"I ask you to risk life and limb in the Crucible, but the desired outcome is not your death."
"But a wound - a tear - festers in the heart of this place."
"The souls that prowl this island writhe in disharmony. Without your help, the-"
"I encountered another of your kind after dealing with the stelgaer in the lowveld."
"I met someone like you in the valley of the boars."
The image falls silent as the woman's form loses definition. In the span of a breath, the apparition dissipates entirely, her words unfinished.
"The Crucible still serves its purpose - bringing Galawain's devoted to battle. Bringing battle to Galawain's devoted."
"Do you see her too?"
"Oh! Where'd she go? Hello, spirit lady?"
"Any idea who that was?"
"Do you sense the turmoil she spoke of?"
"Let's go."
"The future of this place depends upon you seeking the champion's crown."
"Not a clue. Perhaps she was the Seeking Face?"
"Or perhaps some other poor soul trapped here on Kazuwari?"
"Not really, but I don't feel trapped here, exactly. Not like she does."
"I came willingly, after all. Died willingly, I mean."
"And I've got you, right?"
"Perhaps if we complete the other trials, we'll find similar spirits... and hopefully they'll be a touch more cheerful."
